faq.q: Do you only invest in particular areas or industries?
faq.a: While the fund invests based on its criteria and thesis, we do consider all opportunities. That being said we tend to focus on Transformative Technology and within that space specific themes like Disruptive Health, Human Potential, Climate Rehabilitation, Fintech, Blockchain and Digital Assets. Please visit our companies page to learn more.

faq.q: How do you weigh different criteria in your decision-making process?
faq.a: We have developed in large part a list of objective scales. Things like a founder having previous success are rated highly but it is not necessary to meet all criteria with high marks to receive investment. Our key areas of focus are on the founder(s), the team, the product and business model so these are the highest scored areas. Other considerations made are deal structure, industry, potential scale and innovation which are important however can be largely subjective therefore ranked lower.

faq.q: What do you look for in an idea?
faq.a: Truth be told ideas are a dime a dozen, we tend to focus far more on the team, that being said the idea has to have significance. We’re looking for ideas with disruptive potential, innovative techniques and a large market.

faq.q: What do you look for in a founding team?
faq.a: We look for previous success, domain knowledge, execution experience, EQ / IQ and self care.

faq.q: How can you return Double ROI, where others have failed?
faq.a: While we’ve not currently made any investments, we’re targeting 50-100 companies for the fund.

What is your investment process and how long does it take?
faq.a: We have inbound deal flow which hits the first screening process, from there we build a list of questions related to the industry, market and business itself to be reviewed and then asked of the founding team, we then do comprehensive due diligence and at any point in time we have additional questions we will construct and have a meeting with the team to answer. Afterwards we do an evaluation with considerations made and do a legal and compliance review. This process can take up to three weeks.

faq.q: How should I get in touch with you?
faq.a: Contact us with the form, or email us directly fund@ctr.captial

faq.q: How much do you usually invest in a new company?
faq.a: Our minimum investment is $50k with a maximum initial investment of $500k. Typically we reserve 30% for initial investment and 70% for follow on investment with a maximum total invested in one company of $1.5M.

faq.q: Do you have a strict ownership requirements?
faq.a: We do not. We aim for a mutually beneficial arrangement with the company and the fund.

faq.q: What size rounds do you participate in?
faq.a: Typically we do not lead rounds, so it largely depends. We do aim for pre-seed, seed and series A rounds which are within the $1-20M range.
